meta.seo_title: Quant-Grade | Multi-Timeframe Trading Engine | DewCo Portfolio
meta.seo_description: AI-assisted trading engine for Indian equities and crypto with multi-timeframe signals, risk controls, and React/FastAPI stack.
meta.notes_for_future_edit: Add concrete broker/exchange names and live performance summaries once production ready.

paragraphs: Quant-Grade runs multi-timeframe analysis for Indian equities and crypto, producing disciplined signals, risk levels, and automation hooks for traders and small desks. It treats every instrument through the same rule-based pipeline so bias and guesswork are reduced.

The engine is modular across research, alerts, and execution, surfacing insights in a web dashboard and piping them into adapters for paper or live trading as the product moves toward SaaS readiness. Regime checks and alignment filters keep trades selective in noisy markets.

Configurable risk caps, environment modes, and plug-in strategy parameters make it safe to test and iterate. As SaaS packaging matures, the same stack can power white-label dashboards for desks needing disciplined, multi-market coverage.
bullets: Ingests equities/indices and crypto pairs, scoring instruments from 1m to 1W with trend, momentum, and volatility features.
Generates trade hypotheses with entry, stop-loss, and take-profit levels plus regime awareness and alignment checks.
Dashboard watchlists show bias, aligned timeframes, and risk suggestions with near-real-time updates.
Risk controls enforce max per-trade and per-day loss, with environment toggles for backtest, paper, and live.
Adapters and alert channels (email/Telegram-style) keep traders informed and pave the way for broker connectivity.
